titles.title: Restraining Russian Imperialism Act
To require the imposition of sanctions with respect to Russia until Russian troops are removed from the Donbas region of Ukraine.
Restraining Russian Imperialism Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Restraining Russian Imperialism Act
This bill requires the President to impose all available Russia-related sanctions against each individual and entity that meet the criteria for such sanctions until the Russian government removes all of its armed forces from the Donbas region of Ukraine.
